title: hacked account
body:
I went to log into my account 3 days ago to play an aram to find my account permanently banned, it said to check my email for the reason on the ban yet I did not get an email. I sent in a ticket and did not get a response so I then went to the website to check my email to see that the email address that is in my account has been changed to a different email that is not one that I recongnize at all. please give me some clarification as to what I can do to change this back and possibly get my account un-banned as i really really enjoy the game. any help from a long time player would be much appreciated.

thank you.

replies.body: If you're ever worried about the status of your account or why it's banned, you should hit up the account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to verify you as the account creator and work with you to see what can be done.
thank you very much for your reply, I put in a ticket on Sunday and also put one in today, hopefully they can help me out and let me know what is going on or what I can do to fix the situation.
